item.title: Francesca Battistelli - Heaven Everywhere - Key of C
item.description: Play along video for the song Heaven Everywhere performed by Francesca Battistelli. Chords used in the song: Am, Am7, C, C6, Cmaj7, F, G.

item.title: Steven Curtis Chapman - I Want a Ukulele for Christmas - Baritone Ukulele
item.description: Play along video for the song I Want a Ukulele for Christmas performed by Steven Curtis Chapman. Chords used in the song: Am7, C, Cm, Cm6, C♯dim, D7, D7sus4, Dmaj7, E7, Em, Em6, G, G7, Gaug, Gmaj7.

item.title: Steven Curtis Chapman - I Want a Ukulele for Christmas

item.title: Steven Universe - We Are the Crystal Gems - Baritone Ukulele
item.description: Play along video for the song We Are the Crystal Gems performed by Steven Universe. Chords used in the song: A7, Am, Am7, B7, B♭, B♭m, B♭m7, C, C7, Cm, Cmaj7, D7, Dm, E7, Em, F, G, Gm7, Gmaj7.

item.title: Elton John - Rocket Man - Key of C
item.description: Play along video for the song Rocket Man performed by Elton John. Chords used in the song: Am7, C, D, Dm, F, G.

item.title: Huey Lewis & The News - Stuck With You - Baritone Ukulele - Key of C, D
item.description: Play along video for the song Stuck With You performed by Huey Lewis & The News. Chords used in the song: A, Am, Am7, Bm7, C, D, Dm, Em, F, G.

item.description: Play along video for the song Stuck With You performed by Huey Lewis & The News. Chords used in the song: A, Am, Am7, Bm7, C, D, Dm, Em, F, G.
